com.paydiant.android.ui.service.customer

Interface ICustomerRetrieveService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerRetrieveService

    public interface ICustomerRetrieveService
    The interface for the CustomerRetrieveService.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void removeListener()
      Removes the customer retrieve listener and sets it to null.
      void retrieveCustomer()
      Implements the customer retrieve functionality.
      void setCustomerRetrieveListener(ICustomerRetrieveListener listener)
      Sets the customer retrieval listener for the callbacks to be invoked when customer information is requested.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveCustomer

        void retrieveCustomer()
                      throws PaydiantClientException
        Implements the customer retrieve functionality. In addition user should login before calling this method.
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - the paydiant client exception

      • setCustomerRetrieveListener

        void setCustomerRetrieveListener(ICustomerRetrieveListener listener)
        Sets the customer retrieval listener for the callbacks to be invoked when customer information is requested.
        Parameters:
        listener - the customer retrieve listener. This can be either an implementation of ICustomerRetrieveListener or an extended instance of CustomerRetrieveListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        ICustomerRetrieveListener, CustomerRetrieveListenerAdapter

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the customer retrieve listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2
